round_1_issue_verification.title: QualityGateResult Unused Fields
round_1_issue_verification.verification_notes: Documentation added explaining diagnostic vs primary fields. Tests at lines 2163-2180 confirm diagnostic fields are used for asserting which gate failed. Acceptable solution.

positive_notes: D1 fix is acceptable - diagnostic fields serve testability purpose and are now documented
No new bloat introduced in Round 2
orphan_fallbacks counter is a legitimate new metric
